userStories.question: What tip would you give someone like me who was just diagnosed?
userStories.tip: Take a deep breath, there is help and don't be afraid to seek out treatment. I've been HIV + since jun 2014 and the medications are very effective on suppression of the virus. You aren't alone. Seek out help from family or friends or local councils to find support.

userStories.question: What tip would you give someone like me who was just diagnosed?
userStories.tip: Remain calm and be happy

condition.description:
HIV stands for human immunodeficiency virus. It kills or damages the body's immune system cells. AIDS stands for acquired immunodeficiency syndrome. It is the most advanced stage of infection with HIV.

HIV most often spreads through unprotected sex with an infected person. It may also spread by sharing drug needles or through contact with the blood of an infected person. Women can give it to their babies during pregnancy or childbirth.

The first signs of HIV infection may be swollen glands and flu-like symptoms. These may come and go a month or two after infection. Severe symptoms may not appear until months or years later.

A blood test can tell if you have HIV infection. Your health care provider can perform the test, or call the national referral hotline at 1-800-CDC-INFO (24 hours a day, 1-800-232-4636 in English and en español; 1-888-232-6348 - TTY).

There is no cure, but there are many medicines to fight both HIV infection and the infections and cancers that come with it. People can live with the disease for many years.
condition.name: HIV
symptoms: More severe symptoms, including opportunistic infections, after months or years without treatment

carousel_items: Take at bedtime on an empty stomach to lower possible side effects.
Take at the same time every day.
Can cause stomach upset, headache, nausea, difficulty sleeping, vivid dreams, or depression.
Let your doctor know if you start to get a rash.
Practice safe sex since Atripla won't cure HIV or prevent it from being passed on to other people.

basics.benefits_moa: Atripla is a combination pill that contains three antiretroviral (ARV) drugs: tenofovir and emtricitabine (two nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitors) and efavirenz (a non-nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor). It prevents the HIV-1 virus from multiplying and producing new viruses.
basics.bottom_line: Atripla is effective at treating HIV infection and it’s easier to remember to take just one pill instead of three separate medicines.
downsides: Important to take at the same time every day to make sure the virus doesn’t become resistant to the medication.
Atripla can cause kidney damage, increase your risk of depression, and shouldn't be taken if you have a history of seizures or osteoporosis.
Women should avoid becoming pregnant while taking Atripla and for 12 weeks after stopping Atripla.

downsides_processed.orig: Important to take at the same time every day to make sure the virus doesn’t become resistant to the medication.
Atripla can cause kidney damage, increase your risk of depression, and shouldn't be taken if you have a history of seizures or osteoporosis.
Women should avoid becoming pregnant while taking Atripla and for 12 weeks after stopping Atripla.

upsides: Atripla is very effective at treating HIV infection.
Contains three medications in one tablet, so it’s convenient to take.
Generally well-tolerated (not as many side effects) compared to other HIV drugs.

upsides_processed.orig: Atripla is very effective at treating HIV infection.
Contains three medications in one tablet, so it’s convenient to take.
Generally well-tolerated (not as many side effects) compared to other HIV drugs.

drugs.name: Atripla

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take at bedtime on an empty stomach to lower possible side effects.
Take at the same time every day.
Can cause stomach upset, headache, nausea, difficulty sleeping, vivid dreams, or depression.
Let your doctor know if you start to get a rash.
Practice safe sex since Atripla won't cure HIV or prevent it from being passed on to other people.

risks_warnings.title: Psychiatric effects
risks_warnings.description: Atripla has been associated with depression, thoughts of suicide, aggression, and psychosis. If your mood starts to change while taking Atripla, let your doctor know. If you start thinking about wanting to harm yourself, seek medical attention immediately.

description_processed.orig: Atripla has been associated with depression, thoughts of suicide, aggression, and psychosis. If your mood starts to change while taking Atripla, let your doctor know. If you start thinking about wanting to harm yourself, seek medical attention immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Central nervous system (CNS) effects
risks_warnings.description: You can experience some central nervous system side effects when starting Atripla, such as dizziness, trouble sleeping, difficulty concentrating, drowsiness, and strange dreams. Taking Atripla at bedtime will help lower the risk of experiencing these side effects. If these symptoms don't go away and it bothers you, let your doctor know.
risk_factors: Starting Atripla for the first few weeks.
Taking alcohol or other drugs that also affect your nervous system.

description_processed.orig: You can experience some central nervous system side effects when starting Atripla, such as dizziness, trouble sleeping, difficulty concentrating, drowsiness, and strange dreams. Taking Atripla at bedtime will help lower the risk of experiencing these side effects. If these symptoms don't go away and it bothers you, let your doctor know.

risks_warnings.title: Decrease in bone mineral density (BMD)
risks_warnings.description: Atripla can decrease bone mineral density. You may need to have regular X-ray scans to check your bone health.

description_processed.orig: Atripla can decrease bone mineral density. You may need to have regular X-ray scans to check your bone health.

risks_warnings.title: High lactic acid levels in the blood | Enlarged, fatty liver
risks_warnings.description: Atripla can cause this rare but life-threatening condition. Symptoms include deep and rapid breathing, nausea, vomiting, and stomach pain. This is a medical emergency and you should get help right away. Baseline blood work for kidney and liver function are helpful to see if you can use Atripla. It may not be a good choice for people with liver problems.

description_processed.orig: Atripla can cause this rare but life-threatening condition. Symptoms include deep and rapid breathing, nausea, vomiting, and stomach pain. This is a medical emergency and you should get help right away. Baseline blood work for kidney and liver function are helpful to see if you can use Atripla. It may not be a good choice for people with liver problems.

risks_warnings.title: Liver damage
risks_warnings.description: Atripla can damage your liver and is not recommended if you have severe liver disease. Try to limit or avoid alcohol to reduce this risk. Call your doctor right away if you start to have clay-colored stools, yellowing of the eyes or skin, dark urine, stomach pain, or if you are eating less than usual without trying to.
risk_factors: Taking alcohol or other drugs that can damage the liver.

description_processed.orig: Atripla can damage your liver and is not recommended if you have severe liver disease. Try to limit or avoid alcohol to reduce this risk. Call your doctor right away if you start to have clay-colored stools, yellowing of the eyes or skin, dark urine, stomach pain, or if you are eating less than usual without trying to.

risks_warnings.title: Reactivation of hepatitis B
risks_warnings.description: Patients who are infected with both hepatitis B and HIV-1 and have stopped taking Atripla have had their hepatitis B infection become worse. Let your doctor know if you suddenly stop taking Atripla.

description_processed.orig: Patients who are infected with both hepatitis B and HIV-1 and have stopped taking Atripla have had their hepatitis B infection become worse. Let your doctor know if you suddenly stop taking Atripla.

risks_warnings.title: Seizures
risks_warnings.description: Seizures have been observed in patients taking Atripla. Let your doctor know if you have a history of seizures, and they'll decide whether Atripla is the right drug for you, or if there’s other safer options.

description_processed.orig: Seizures have been observed in patients taking Atripla. Let your doctor know if you have a history of seizures, and they'll decide whether Atripla is the right drug for you, or if there’s other safer options.

risks_warnings.title: Harm to fetus
risks_warnings.description: During the first trimester of pregnancy, harm to a fetus could occur if you're taking Atripla. Make sure to use reliable birth control when taking Atripla to prevent pregnancy. If you want to get pregnant in the future, let your doctor know. You'll likely have to stop taking Atripla for at least 12 weeks before trying to get pregnant.

description_processed.orig: During the first trimester of pregnancy, harm to a fetus could occur if you're taking Atripla. Make sure to use reliable birth control when taking Atripla to prevent pregnancy. If you want to get pregnant in the future, let your doctor know. You'll likely have to stop taking Atripla for at least 12 weeks before trying to get pregnant.

risks_warnings.title: Immune reconstitution syndrome
risks_warnings.description: People who first start taking Atripla can experience inflammatory responses (fever and swelling) to infections that their bodies were too weak to fight off before. Call your doctor if you get a high fever or swelling if you start taking Atripla as they might have to start you on other medications to help fight off infections.

description_processed.orig: People who first start taking Atripla can experience inflammatory responses (fever and swelling) to infections that their bodies were too weak to fight off before. Call your doctor if you get a high fever or swelling if you start taking Atripla as they might have to start you on other medications to help fight off infections.

risks_warnings.title: Rash
risks_warnings.description: You might notice a rash when starting Atripla. It’s usually harmless and goes away on its own after about a month. In rare cases, Atripla could lead to life-threatening skin reactions such as Stevens-Johnson Syndrome (SJS). Let your doctor know if you get a rash while taking Atripla, and seek medical attention right away if you also have a fever or blisters with the rash.
risk_factors: Starting Atripla in the first two weeks.

description_processed.orig: You might notice a rash when starting Atripla. It’s usually harmless and goes away on its own after about a month. In rare cases, Atripla could lead to life-threatening skin reactions such as Stevens-Johnson Syndrome (SJS). Let your doctor know if you get a rash while taking Atripla, and seek medical attention right away if you also have a fever or blisters with the rash.

risks_warnings.title: Fat redistribution
risks_warnings.description: People on medications to treat HIV such as Atripla have reported changes in the way fat is placed in the body, including more fat in the abdomen and breasts and less fat in the face, arms and legs. Talk to your doctor if this is a problem.

description_processed.orig: People on medications to treat HIV such as Atripla have reported changes in the way fat is placed in the body, including more fat in the abdomen and breasts and less fat in the face, arms and legs. Talk to your doctor if this is a problem.

risks_warnings.title: Worsening kidney function
risks_warnings.description: Atripla is removed from the body by the kidney. Kidney (renal) damage, including cases of renal failure and Fanconi syndrome (injury to the tubes inside of the kidney), has been reported with the use of Atripla. Your doctor must continually monitor the function of your kidneys while you are taking Atripla.

description_processed.orig: Atripla is removed from the body by the kidney. Kidney (renal) damage, including cases of renal failure and Fanconi syndrome (injury to the tubes inside of the kidney), has been reported with the use of Atripla. Your doctor must continually monitor the function of your kidneys while you are taking Atripla.

images.labeler: Bristol Myers Squibb & Gilead Sciences, LLC

points.name: Insomnia
points.hlt: disturbances in initiating and maintaining sleep

carousel_items: Since emtricitabine is only taken once a day, take it at the same time as your other HIV medications.
If being used for kids, the dose of emtricitabine will continue to change as they grow, so keep in touch with their doctor.
Keep an eye out for any new symptoms or side effects you may start to feel while taking emtricitabine and report them to your doctor.

basics.benefits_moa: emtricitabine stops the replication of the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) within important cells of the body by preventing the virus from taking over normal functions of the cell for its own purposes.
basics.bottom_line: emtricitabine is currently one of the most popular drugs within the Nucleoside Reverse Transcriptase Inhibitor (NRTI) drug class.
downsides: Can't be taken with any drugs containing lamivudine since both are so similar to each other.
emtricitabine is removed from the body by the kidneys, so the dose of emtricitabine needs to be lowered if you have any kidney problems.
Kids have a higher chance than adults of skin color changes on their hands and feet while taking emtricitabine.

downsides_processed.orig: Can't be taken with any drugs containing lamivudine since both are so similar to each other.
emtricitabine is removed from the body by the kidneys, so the dose of emtricitabine needs to be lowered if you have any kidney problems.
Kids have a higher chance than adults of skin color changes on their hands and feet while taking emtricitabine.

upsides: Take with or without food once a day.
emtricitabine can be taken as a capsule or liquid.
The emtricitabine oral solution can be stored for up to 3 months in the refrigerator.
emtricitabine is contained in the following combination products: Atripla, Complera, Stribild, and Truvada.

upsides_processed.orig: Take with or without food once a day.
emtricitabine can be taken as a capsule or liquid.
The emtricitabine oral solution can be stored for up to 3 months in the refrigerator.
emtricitabine is contained in the following combination products: Atripla, Complera, Stribild, and Truvada.

drugs.one_liner: Works with other medicines to treat HIV infection.
drugs.name: Emtriva

carousel_items_processed.orig: Since emtricitabine is only taken once a day, take it at the same time as your other HIV medications.
If being used for kids, the dose of emtricitabine will continue to change as they grow, so keep in touch with their doctor.
Keep an eye out for any new symptoms or side effects you may start to feel while taking emtricitabine and report them to your doctor.

risks_warnings.title: Lactic acidosis
risks_warnings.description: emtricitabine can cause this rare but life-threatening condition. Symptoms include deep and rapid breathing, nausea, vomiting, and stomach pain. This is a medical emergency and you should get help right away. Baseline blood work for kidney and liver function are helpful to see if you can use emtricitabine. It may not be a good choice for people with liver problems.

description_processed.orig: emtricitabine can cause this rare but life-threatening condition. Symptoms include deep and rapid breathing, nausea, vomiting, and stomach pain. This is a medical emergency and you should get help right away. Baseline blood work for kidney and liver function are helpful to see if you can use emtricitabine. It may not be a good choice for people with liver problems.

risks_warnings.title: Cannot be used to treat Hepatitis B Virus (HBV)
risks_warnings.description: Severe worsening of Hepatitis B has been seen in patients who have stopped taking emtricitabine. Liver function should be closely watched in people who have both HIV and HBV.

description_processed.orig: Severe worsening of Hepatitis B has been seen in patients who have stopped taking emtricitabine. Liver function should be closely watched in people who have both HIV and HBV.

risks_warnings.title: Immune reconstitution syndrome
risks_warnings.description: When starting emtricitabine, your immune system should start to work better and may launch an all out attack on other infections that have been hiding. You should tell your doctor as soon as you start to experience sudden changes in your health.
risk_factors: Start of a new HIV medication

description_processed.orig: When starting emtricitabine, your immune system should start to work better and may launch an all out attack on other infections that have been hiding. You should tell your doctor as soon as you start to experience sudden changes in your health.

risks_warnings.title: Fat Redistribution
risks_warnings.description: Redistribution or accumulation of body fat has been observed in patients receiving antiretroviral therapy and may look different for individual patients.

description_processed.orig: Redistribution or accumulation of body fat has been observed in patients receiving antiretroviral therapy and may look different for individual patients.

carousel_items: The doses for lamivudine are different for HIV and Hepatitis B.
If being used for kids, the dose of lamivudine will continue to change as they grow, so keep in touch with their doctor.
Keep an eye out for any new symptoms or side effects you may start to feel while taking lamivudine and report them to your doctor.

basics.benefits_moa: lamivudine stops the replication of the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) within important cells of the body by preventing the virus from taking over normal functions of the cell for its own purposes.
basics.bottom_line: lamivudine is currently one of the most popular drugs within the Nucleoside Reverse Transcriptase Inhibitor (NRTI) drug class.
downsides: lamivudine should not be used with any other drugs containing Emtriva (emtricitabine) since both are so similar to each other.
Use with caution in kids with a history of pancreatitis (pancreas infection).
Most common side effects are headache, nausea, tiredness, congestion, diarrhea, and cough.
The dose of lamivudine needs to be lowered if you have kidney problems.

downsides_processed.orig: lamivudine should not be used with any other drugs containing Emtriva (emtricitabine) since both are so similar to each other.
Use with caution in kids with a history of pancreatitis (pancreas infection).
Most common side effects are headache, nausea, tiredness, congestion, diarrhea, and cough.
The dose of lamivudine needs to be lowered if you have kidney problems.

upsides: lamivudine is available as a tablet and oral solution.
Can be taken once or twice a day.
One of the more popular drugs in its class.
lamivudine is contained in the following combination products: Combivir, Epzicom, and Trizivir.

upsides_processed.orig: lamivudine is available as a tablet and oral solution.
Can be taken once or twice a day.
One of the more popular drugs in its class.
lamivudine is contained in the following combination products: Combivir, Epzicom, and Trizivir.

If being used for kids, the dose of lamivudine will continue to change as they grow, so keep in touch with their doctor.
Keep an eye out for any new symptoms or side effects you may start to feel while taking lamivudine and report them to your doctor.

risks_warnings.title: Lactic acidosis
risks_warnings.description: lamivudine can cause this rare but life-threatening condition. Symptoms include deep and rapid breathing, nausea, vomiting, and stomach pain. This is a medical emergency and you should get help right away. Baseline blood work for kidney and liver function are helpful to see if you can use lamivudine. It may not be a good choice for people with liver problems.

risks_warnings.title: Acute Exacerbation of Hepatitis B Virus (HBV)
risks_warnings.description: Severe worsening of Hepatitis B has been seen in patients who have stopped taking lamivudine. Liver function should be closely watched in people who have both HIV and HBV.

description_processed.orig: Severe worsening of Hepatitis B has been seen in patients who have stopped taking lamivudine. Liver function should be closely watched in people who have both HIV and HBV.

risks_warnings.title: lamivudine Dosage Forms
risks_warnings.description: Patients with HIV-1 infection should receive only dosage forms of EPIVIR appropriate for treatment of HIV-1.

description_processed.orig: Patients with HIV-1 infection should receive only dosage forms of EPIVIR appropriate for treatment of HIV-1.

risks_warnings.title: Pancreatitis
risks_warnings.description: Serious, even deadly, pancreatitis (infections of the pancreas) has occurred during treatment with lamivudine when used alone or in combination with other HIV medications. lamivudine should be stopped immediately in people with signs or symptoms of pancreatitis.

description_processed.orig: Serious, even deadly, pancreatitis (infections of the pancreas) has occurred during treatment with lamivudine when used alone or in combination with other HIV medications. lamivudine should be stopped immediately in people with signs or symptoms of pancreatitis.

risks_warnings.title: Immune reconstitution syndrome
risks_warnings.description: When starting lamivudine, your immune system should start to work better and may launch an all out attack on other infections that have been hiding. You should tell your doctor as soon as you start to experience sudden changes in your health.
risk_factors: Start of a new HIV medication

description_processed.orig: When starting lamivudine, your immune system should start to work better and may launch an all out attack on other infections that have been hiding. You should tell your doctor as soon as you start to experience sudden changes in your health.

risks_warnings.title: Fat Redistribution
risks_warnings.description: Redistribution or accumulation of body fat has been observed in patients receiving antiretroviral therapy and may look different for individual patients.

description_processed.orig: Redistribution or accumulation of body fat has been observed in patients receiving antiretroviral therapy and may look different for individual patients.

userStories.tip: I use Intelence and Truvada combination works perfectly for me, no side effects from the combo.

carousel_items: Set two times during the day, one in the morning and one in the evening that you will remember to take Isentress.
Take Isentress with or without food.
Isentress can make you tired, so avoid other medications or drinks that will add to the problem.
If being used for kids, the dose of Isentress will continue to change as they grow, so keep in touch with their doctor.

basics.benefits_moa: Isentress stops the replication of the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) within important cells of the body by preventing the virus from taking over normal functions of the cell for its own purposes.
basics.bottom_line: This is the first medication approved as an Integrase Inhibitor (InSTI), so it may be a great, but somewhat expensive, option for people who have already tried other drugs and need another option.
downsides: Tablets, chewable tablets, and the oral suspension all have different doses, so talk to your doctor if you want to switch from one to another.
The oral suspension has to be taken within 30 minutes of mixing it.
Avoid taking antacids that contain aluminum and/or magnesium while taking Isentress.
Let your doctor know right away if while taking Isentress you begin to feel unexplained muscle pain.

downsides_processed.orig: Tablets, chewable tablets, and the oral suspension all have different doses, so talk to your doctor if you want to switch from one to another.
The oral suspension has to be taken within 30 minutes of mixing it.
Avoid taking antacids that contain aluminum and/or magnesium while taking Isentress.
Let your doctor know right away if while taking Isentress you begin to feel unexplained muscle pain.

upsides: If having difficulty swallowing the tablet, consider the chewable tablet or oral suspension.
Only one tablet taken two times a day.
Can be used for kids 4 weeks and older.
May be helpful if other HIV drugs have stopped working since Isentress works differently than most HIV drugs.

upsides_processed.orig: If having difficulty swallowing the tablet, consider the chewable tablet or oral suspension.
Only one tablet taken two times a day.
Can be used for kids 4 weeks and older.
May be helpful if other HIV drugs have stopped working since Isentress works differently than most HIV drugs.

drugs.one_liner: Works with other medicines to treat HIV infection.

userStories.tip: there really were no surprises

drugs.name: Isentress

carousel_items_processed.orig: Set two times during the day, one in the morning and one in the evening that you will remember to take Isentress.
Take Isentress with or without food.
Isentress can make you tired, so avoid other medications or drinks that will add to the problem.
If being used for kids, the dose of Isentress will continue to change as they grow, so keep in touch with their doctor.

risks_warnings.title: Severe skin reactions
risks_warnings.description: Severe, potentially life-threatening, skin reactions have been reported. Seek immediate medical attention if you notice a new or severe rash, a rash accompanied by fever, unexplained blisters, or many new sores in your mouth.
risk_factors: Prior severe allergic reaction to Isentress

description_processed.orig: Severe, potentially life-threatening, skin reactions have been reported. Seek immediate medical attention if you notice a new or severe rash, a rash accompanied by fever, unexplained blisters, or many new sores in your mouth.

risks_warnings.title: Hypersensitivity (allergic) reactions
risks_warnings.description: Isentress has been reported to cause hypersensitivity reactions (severe rash, trouble breathing) and angioedema (life-threatening condition with swelling with or without hives). Seek immediate medical attention.
risk_factors: Prior severe allergic reaction to Isentress

description_processed.orig: Isentress has been reported to cause hypersensitivity reactions (severe rash, trouble breathing) and angioedema (life-threatening condition with swelling with or without hives). Seek immediate medical attention.

risks_warnings.title: Phenylalanine reaction
risks_warnings.description: Isentress chewable tablets contain phenylalanine and this ingredient can be harmful to patients with phenylketonuria.

description_processed.orig: Isentress chewable tablets contain phenylalanine and this ingredient can be harmful to patients with phenylketonuria.

risks_warnings.title: Liver and muscle problems
risks_warnings.description: Combining certain medications can increase the risk of muscle pain (myopathy), muscle damage (rhabdomyolysis), and kidney damage. Talk to your doctor or pharmacist when taking any new medications.
risk_factors: Certain drugs can increase the dose of Isentress in the body

description_processed.orig: Combining certain medications can increase the risk of muscle pain (myopathy), muscle damage (rhabdomyolysis), and kidney damage. Talk to your doctor or pharmacist when taking any new medications.

risks_warnings.title: Immune reconstitution syndrome
risks_warnings.description: When starting Isentress, your immune system should start to work better and may launch an all out attack on other infections that have been hiding. You should tell your doctor as soon as you start to experience sudden changes in your health.
risk_factors: Start of a new HIV medication

description_processed.orig: When starting Isentress, your immune system should start to work better and may launch an all out attack on other infections that have been hiding. You should tell your doctor as soon as you start to experience sudden changes in your health.

off-label_indications.indication: Postnatal transmission; Prophylaxis Severe acute respiratory syndrome

carousel_items: Don't take AZT with stavudine, another HIV drug.
Work with your doctor to get regular blood tests. The goal is to make sure the drug is working well and safely.
Keep an eye out for any new symptoms or side effects you may start to feel while taking AZT and report them to your doctor.
Read the Medication Guide given to you at the pharmacy about AZT since it contains helpful information.

basics.benefits_moa: AZT stops the replication of the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) within important cells of the body by preventing the virus from taking over normal functions of the cell for its own purposes.
basics.bottom_line: AZT can be a good second-line choice to take within the Nucleoside Reverse Transcriptase Inhibitor (NRTI) drug class. AZT can have a number of serious side effects, but if you don't have prior blood, kidney, or liver problems, you should consider it.
downsides: AZT may cause serious blood, muscle, and liver problems.
Poor kidney function will affect how much AZT you can take.
Allergies to AZT are rare, but very serious.
Need to get regular blood tests.

downsides_processed.orig: AZT may cause serious blood, muscle, and liver problems.
Poor kidney function will affect how much AZT you can take.
Allergies to AZT are rare, but very serious.
Need to get regular blood tests.

upsides: AZT is provided as capsules, tablets, and syrup.
Used in kids and babies.
Take AZT with or without food.
AZT is included in the combination drugs Trizivir (AZT, Epivir, and Ziagen) and Combivir (AZT and Epivir), both of which are taken twice a day.

upsides_processed.orig: AZT is provided as capsules, tablets, and syrup.
Used in kids and babies.
Take AZT with or without food.
AZT is included in the combination drugs Trizivir (AZT, Epivir, and Ziagen) and Combivir (AZT and Epivir), both of which are taken twice a day.

drugs.one_liner: Works with other medicines to treat HIV infection. Also prevents mother-to-child sharing of HIV.
drugs.name: Retrovir

off-label_indications.indication: in combination with interferon alfa; HIV infection prophylaxis

carousel_items_processed.orig: Don't take AZT with stavudine, another HIV drug.
Work with your doctor to get regular blood tests. The goal is to make sure the drug is working well and safely.
Keep an eye out for any new symptoms or side effects you may start to feel while taking AZT and report them to your doctor.
Read the Medication Guide given to you at the pharmacy about AZT since it contains helpful information.

risks_warnings.title: Blood toxicity & Bone marrow toxicity
risks_warnings.description: AZT can cause serious changes to your blood and bone marrow. Frequent blood counts are strongly recommended for people who have previously had low bone marrow levels of granulocytes. For people with early HIV disease, periodic blood counts are recommended. If anemia or neutropenia develops, dosage changes may be needed.

description_processed.orig: AZT can cause serious changes to your blood and bone marrow. Frequent blood counts are strongly recommended for people who have previously had low bone marrow levels of granulocytes. For people with early HIV disease, periodic blood counts are recommended. If anemia or neutropenia develops, dosage changes may be needed.

risks_warnings.title: Muscle damage
risks_warnings.description: Combining certain medications can increase the risk of muscle pain (myopathy), muscle damage (rhabdomyolysis), and kidney damage. Talk to your doctor or pharmacist when taking any new medications.

description_processed.orig: Combining certain medications can increase the risk of muscle pain (myopathy), muscle damage (rhabdomyolysis), and kidney damage. Talk to your doctor or pharmacist when taking any new medications.

risks_warnings.title: Lactic acidosis
risks_warnings.description: AZT can cause this rare but life-threatening condition. Symptoms include deep and rapid breathing, nausea, vomiting, and stomach pain. This is a medical emergency and you should get help right away. Baseline blood work for kidney and liver function are helpful to see if you can use AZT. It may not be a good choice for people with liver problems.

risks_warnings.description: When starting AZT, your immune system should start to work better and may launch an all out attack on other infections that have been hiding. You should tell your doctor as soon as you start to experience sudden changes in your health.
risk_factors: Start of a new HIV medication

description_processed.orig: When starting AZT, your immune system should start to work better and may launch an all out attack on other infections that have been hiding. You should tell your doctor as soon as you start to experience sudden changes in your health.

risks_warnings.title: Fat Redistribution
risks_warnings.description: Redistribution or accumulation of body fat has been observed in patients receiving antiretroviral therapy and may look different for individual patients.

description_processed.orig: Redistribution or accumulation of body fat has been observed in patients receiving antiretroviral therapy and may look different for individual patients.

userStories.tip: to not use ritonavir, I had to take it with food, but as bid it was perfect in that it reminded me to eat!
I take my pill with dinner every night, with a 300 calorie meal or more.

carousel_items: Talk with your doctor about all other medications you are taking since Videx interacts with many other drugs.
Work with your doctor to get regular blood tests. The goal is to make sure the drug is working well and safely.
Keep an eye out for any new symptoms or side effects you may start to feel while taking Videx and report them to your doctor.
Read the Medication Guide given to you at the pharmacy about Videx since it contains helpful information.

basics.benefits_moa: Videx stops the replication of the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) within important cells of the body by preventing the virus from taking over normal functions of the cell for its own purposes.
basics.bottom_line: Within the Nucleoside Reverse Transcriptase Inhibitor (NRTI) drug class, Videx can be a difficult drug to take. Videx has numerous serious side effects. It is also difficult taking Videx twice a day on an empty stomach.
downsides: Must take on an empty stomach at least 30 minutes before, or 2 hours after eating.
Take twice a day.
The amount of Videx you will take is based on your body weight, kidney, and liver function.
May cause serious side effects in your liver, kidneys, and pancreas.
Can cause significant tingling in your hands or feet.

downsides_processed.orig: Must take on an empty stomach at least 30 minutes before, or 2 hours after eating.
Take twice a day.
The amount of Videx you will take is based on your body weight, kidney, and liver function.
May cause serious side effects in your liver, kidneys, and pancreas.
Can cause significant tingling in your hands or feet.

upsides: The oral solution can be stored in the refrigerator for up to 30 days.
While Videx doesn’t cure HIV, it does reduce the number of viral copies being made in your blood, giving your healthy immune cells (CD4 cells) a better chance to do their job.

upsides_processed.orig: The oral solution can be stored in the refrigerator for up to 30 days.
While Videx doesn’t cure HIV, it does reduce the number of viral copies being made in your blood, giving your healthy immune cells (CD4 cells) a better chance to do their job.

drugs.one_liner: Works with other medicines to treat HIV infection.
drugs.name: Videx

carousel_items_processed.orig: Talk with your doctor about all other medications you are taking since Videx interacts with many other drugs.
Work with your doctor to get regular blood tests. The goal is to make sure the drug is working well and safely.
Keep an eye out for any new symptoms or side effects you may start to feel while taking Videx and report them to your doctor.
Read the Medication Guide given to you at the pharmacy about Videx since it contains helpful information.

risks_warnings.title: Pancreatitis
risks_warnings.description: Serious, even deadly, pancreatitis (infections of the pancreas) has occurred during treatment with Videx when used alone or in combination with other HIV medications. Videx should be stopped immediately in people with signs or symptoms of pancreatitis.
risk_factors: Use of stavudine, another HIV drug

description_processed.orig: Serious, even deadly, pancreatitis (infections of the pancreas) has occurred during treatment with Videx when used alone or in combination with other HIV medications. Videx should be stopped immediately in people with signs or symptoms of pancreatitis.

risks_warnings.title: Lactic acidosis
risks_warnings.description: Videx can cause this rare but life-threatening condition. Symptoms include deep and rapid breathing, nausea, vomiting, and stomach pain. This is a medical emergency and you should get help right away. Baseline blood work for kidney and liver function are helpful to see if you can use Videx. It may not be a good choice for people with liver problems.
risk_factors: Use of stavudine, another HIV drug

description_processed.orig: Videx can cause this rare but life-threatening condition. Symptoms include deep and rapid breathing, nausea, vomiting, and stomach pain. This is a medical emergency and you should get help right away. Baseline blood work for kidney and liver function are helpful to see if you can use Videx. It may not be a good choice for people with liver problems.

risks_warnings.title: Liver damage
risks_warnings.description: During HIV treatment, people with previous liver disease have a higher chance of serious, and possibly fatal, liver problems. Your doctor will closely monitor how your liver is working while you are taking Videx. If there is evidence that your liver isn't functioning as well as it used to, Videx may need to be stopped.
risk_factors: Use of hydroxyurea, stavudine, and Videx together

description_processed.orig: During HIV treatment, people with previous liver disease have a higher chance of serious, and possibly fatal, liver problems. Your doctor will closely monitor how your liver is working while you are taking Videx. If there is evidence that your liver isn't functioning as well as it used to, Videx may need to be stopped.

risks_warnings.title: Peripheral neuropathy
risks_warnings.description: Peripheral neuropathy, better known as numbness, tingling, or pain in your hands or feet, has been seen in people taking Videx. This has occurred more frequently in people with advanced HIV disease. If this occurs, talk to your doctor about stopping Videx treatment.
risk_factors: Use of stavudine, another HIV drug

description_processed.orig: Peripheral neuropathy, better known as numbness, tingling, or pain in your hands or feet, has been seen in people taking Videx. This has occurred more frequently in people with advanced HIV disease. If this occurs, talk to your doctor about stopping Videx treatment.

risks_warnings.title: Eye changes
risks_warnings.description: Changes to your vision may occur while taking Videx. If this happens, talk to your doctor about stopping Videx treatment.

description_processed.orig: Changes to your vision may occur while taking Videx. If this happens, talk to your doctor about stopping Videx treatment.

risks_warnings.title: Immune reconstitution syndrome
risks_warnings.description: When starting Videx, your immune system should start to work better and may launch an all out attack on other infections that have been hiding. You should tell your doctor as soon as you start to experience sudden changes in your health.
risk_factors: Start of a new HIV medication

description_processed.orig: When starting Videx, your immune system should start to work better and may launch an all out attack on other infections that have been hiding. You should tell your doctor as soon as you start to experience sudden changes in your health.

risks_warnings.title: Fat Redistribution
risks_warnings.description: Redistribution or accumulation of body fat has been observed in patients receiving antiretroviral therapy and may look different for individual patients.

carousel_items: Don't take other drugs that can hurt your kidneys while taking tenofovir without talking to your doctor. That sadly includes non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs), like aspirin, Advil, and Aleve.
People with HIV should be tested for Hepatitis B virus (HBV) before starting tenofovir.
Similarly, patients with chronic hepatitis B, should be tested for HIV before starting tenofovir.
Decreases in bone mineral density can happen while taking tenofovir.
Work with your doctor to monitor your kidney function and bone mineral density regularly.

basics.benefits_moa: tenofovir stops the replication of the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) within important cells of the body by preventing the virus from taking over normal functions of the cell for its own purposes.
basics.bottom_line: tenofovir can be a good choice to take within the Nucleoside Reverse Transcriptase Inhibitor (NRTI) drug class. It may not be the best choice though for people with kidney problems.
downsides: The tenofovir powder can't be mixed in a liquid, so mix into soft food like applesauce and yogurt.
The dose of tenofovir depends on how your kidneys work. It is really important to consistently monitor them with your doctor.

downsides_processed.orig: The tenofovir powder can't be mixed in a liquid, so mix into soft food like applesauce and yogurt.
The dose of tenofovir depends on how your kidneys work. It is really important to consistently monitor them with your doctor.

upsides: Take tenofovir once a day, with or without food.
For people who can't swallow the tablet, take the powder instead.
tenofovir is used for HIV in kids 2 years and older, and chronic hepatitis B in kids 12 years and older.

upsides_processed.orig: Take tenofovir once a day, with or without food.
For people who can't swallow the tablet, take the powder instead.
tenofovir is used for HIV in kids 2 years and older, and chronic hepatitis B in kids 12 years and older.

drugs.one_liner: Works with other medicines to treat HIV infection. Also treats Hepatitis B Virus.
drugs.name: Viread

carousel_items_processed.orig: Don't take other drugs that can hurt your kidneys while taking tenofovir without talking to your doctor. That sadly includes non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs), like aspirin, Advil, and Aleve.
People with HIV should be tested for Hepatitis B virus (HBV) before starting tenofovir.
Similarly, patients with chronic hepatitis B, should be tested for HIV before starting tenofovir.
Decreases in bone mineral density can happen while taking tenofovir.
Work with your doctor to monitor your kidney function and bone mineral density regularly.

risks_warnings.title: Lactic acidosis
risks_warnings.description: tenofovir can cause this rare but life-threatening condition. Symptoms include deep and rapid breathing, nausea, vomiting, and stomach pain. This is a medical emergency and you should get help right away. Baseline blood work for kidney and liver function are helpful to see if you can use tenofovir. It may not be a good choice for people with liver problems.

description_processed.orig: tenofovir can cause this rare but life-threatening condition. Symptoms include deep and rapid breathing, nausea, vomiting, and stomach pain. This is a medical emergency and you should get help right away. Baseline blood work for kidney and liver function are helpful to see if you can use tenofovir. It may not be a good choice for people with liver problems.

risks_warnings.title: Acute Exacerbation of Hepatitis B Virus (HBV)
risks_warnings.description: Severe worsening of Hepatitis B has been seen in patients who have stopped taking tenofovir. Liver function should be closely watched in people who have both HIV and HBV.

description_processed.orig: Severe worsening of Hepatitis B has been seen in patients who have stopped taking tenofovir. Liver function should be closely watched in people who have both HIV and HBV.

risks_warnings.title: Worsening kidney function
risks_warnings.description: tenofovir is removed from the body by the kidney. Kidney (renal) damage, including cases of renal failure and Fanconi syndrome (injury to the tubes inside of the kidney), has been reported with the use of tenofovir. Your doctor must continually monitor the function of your kidneys while you are taking tenofovir.

description_processed.orig: tenofovir is removed from the body by the kidney. Kidney (renal) damage, including cases of renal failure and Fanconi syndrome (injury to the tubes inside of the kidney), has been reported with the use of tenofovir. Your doctor must continually monitor the function of your kidneys while you are taking tenofovir.

risks_warnings.title: Decrease in bone mineral density (BMD)
risks_warnings.description: Consider assessment of bone mineral density in people with a history of fractures or other risk factors for osteoporosis or bone loss.

description_processed.orig: Consider assessment of bone mineral density in people with a history of fractures or other risk factors for osteoporosis or bone loss.

risks_warnings.description: When starting tenofovir, your immune system should start to work better and may launch an all out attack on other infections that have been hiding. You should tell your doctor as soon as you start to experience sudden changes in your health.
risk_factors: Start of a new HIV medication

carousel_items: Set a timer on your phone to make sure you don't forget to take stavudine at the right time.
Talk with your doctor about all other medications you are taking since stavudine interacts with many other drugs.
Work with your doctor to get regular blood tests. The goal is to make sure the drug is working well and safely.
Keep an eye out for any new symptoms or side effects you may start to feel while taking stavudine and report them to your doctor.

basics.benefits_moa: stavudine stops the replication of the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) within important cells of the body by preventing the virus from taking over normal functions of the cell for its own purposes.
basics.bottom_line: Within the Nucleoside Reverse Transcriptase Inhibitor (NRTI) drug class, stavudine can be a difficult drug to take. stavudine has numerous serious side effects and probably won't be your first choice.
downsides: Must take twice a day, every 12 hours.
The amount of stavudine you will take is based on your body weight, kidney, and liver function.
Interacts with many different medications.
May cause serious side effects in your liver, kidneys, and pancreas.
Can cause significant tingling in your hands or feet.

carousel_items: To best deal with stomach upset and other side effects, either take abacavir twice a day for lower effects throughout the day, or once a day at night to sleep through the bulk of effects.
Work with your healthcare provider to get regular blood tests. The goal is to make sure the drug is working well and safely.
If being used for kids, the dose of abacavir will continue to change as they grow, so keep in touch with their doctor.

basics.benefits_moa: abacavir stops the replication of the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) within important cells of the body by preventing the virus from taking over normal functions of the cell for its own purposes.
basics.bottom_line: If you don't have an allergic reaction to the drug and have good liver function, then this drug is a decent option within within the Nucleoside Reverse Transcriptase Inhibitor (NRTI) drug class.
downsides: This is not a great medication to take if you have liver problems.
Severe allergic reactions to abacavir are possible. Genetic testing may help identify if you are likely to react poorly to abacavir.
Once someone has an allergic reaction to abacavir, they can't take any other medications containing abacavir in the future.

downsides_processed.orig: This is not a great medication to take if you have liver problems.
Severe allergic reactions to abacavir are possible. Genetic testing may help identify if you are likely to react poorly to abacavir.
Once someone has an allergic reaction to abacavir, they can't take any other medications containing abacavir in the future.

upsides: Can take one tablet twice a day, or two tablets once a day.
abacavir is in a number of other combination meds, so you may be able to find a single drug that has abacavir and other HIV medicines you are taking in a single product.
Can be used for kids 3 months and older.

carousel_items_processed.orig: To best deal with stomach upset and other side effects, either take abacavir twice a day for lower effects throughout the day, or once a day at night to sleep through the bulk of effects.

If being used for kids, the dose of abacavir will continue to change as they grow, so keep in touch with their doctor.

risks_warnings.title: Hypersensitivity (allergic) reactions
risks_warnings.description: abacavir has been reported to cause hypersensitivity reactions (severe rash, trouble breathing) and angioedema (life-threatening condition with swelling with or without hives). Seek immediate medical attention.
risk_factors: Prior severe allergic reaction to abacavir

description_processed.orig: abacavir has been reported to cause hypersensitivity reactions (severe rash, trouble breathing) and angioedema (life-threatening condition with swelling with or without hives). Seek immediate medical attention.

This is a medical emergency and you should get help right away. Baseline blood work for kidney and liver function are helpful to see if you can use abacavir. It may not be a good choice for people with liver problems.

description_processed.orig: When starting abacavir, your immune system should start to work better and may launch an all out attack on other infections that have been hiding. You should tell your doctor as soon as you start to experience sudden changes in your health.

risks_warnings.title: Fat Redistribution

risks_warnings.title: Myocardial infarction (heart attack)
risks_warnings.description: In a small study, the use of abacavir was associated with an increased risk of heart attack. This is rare to see, but to be safe, doctors are encouraged to check your heart's function before prescribing abacavir. People taking abacavir are also encouraged to eat healthily, not smoke, and exercise consistently.

description_processed.orig: In a small study, the use of abacavir was associated with an increased risk of heart attack. This is rare to see, but to be safe, doctors are encouraged to check your heart's function before prescribing abacavir. People taking abacavir are also encouraged to eat healthily, not smoke, and exercise consistently.

off-label_indications.indication: Postnatal transmission; Prophylaxis Severe acute respiratory syndrome

carousel_items: Since Truvada is only taken once a day, try taking it at the same time as your other HIV medications.
If being used for kids, the dose of Truvada will continue to change as they grow, so keep in touch with their doctor.
Keep an eye out for any new symptoms or side effects you may start to feel while taking Truvada and report them to your doctor.
Practice safe sex while taking Truvada since the medication will not stop you from passing HIV to other people.

basics.benefits_moa: Truvada is a combination medication that stops the replication of the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) within important cells of the body. Emtricitabine and tenofovir both prevent the virus from taking over normal functions of the cell for its own purposes.
basics.bottom_line: Truvada is a popular combination medicine that has two drugs with the same mechanism of action to treat and prevent HIV infection.
downsides: Has to be taken at the same time every day or your body can become resistant to the medication.
Can't be taken on its own to treat HIV.
Can cause unusual dreams, or kidney or liver damage.
Can't be taken with any drugs containing lamivudine since both are so similar to each other.
Truvada is removed from the body by the kidneys, so the dose of Truvada needs to be lowered if you have any kidney problems.

downsides_processed.orig: Has to be taken at the same time every day or your body can become resistant to the medication.
Can't be taken on its own to treat HIV.
Can cause unusual dreams, or kidney or liver damage.
Can't be taken with any drugs containing lamivudine since both are so similar to each other.
Truvada is removed from the body by the kidneys, so the dose of Truvada needs to be lowered if you have any kidney problems.

upsides: First-line treatment for preventing HIV infection in combination with other HIV medications.
Only has to be taken once a day.
Truvada prevents and treats HIV infection.
Used for preventing HIV infection in case you've been accidentally exposed or if you're in danger of being exposed.

upsides_processed.orig: First-line treatment for preventing HIV infection in combination with other HIV medications.
Only has to be taken once a day.
Truvada prevents and treats HIV infection.
Used for preventing HIV infection in case you've been accidentally exposed or if you're in danger of being exposed.

userStories.indication: To reduce risk of getting HIV from husband
userStories.identifier: gay man w/ HIV+ husband; monogamous
userStories.tip: I take it with breakfast. The main side effect I noticed was cramping, which comes and goes, and seems to be less of a problem if I stay hydrated.
I had a few headaches the first couple of days but they subsided quickly. No side effects now, just a considerably more relaxed sex life.
It is easy to take this blue pill once a day, at the same time every day. Don't miss a day, if possible.
userStories.identifier: Single gay white male in Palm Springs CA

userStories.tip: I take it in the morning.  I found taking a probiotic helped avoid stomach issues
No side effects. I take it in the evening, before bed.
Phone alarm and pill box are highly recommended.

1 I set an alarm fee 24 hrs on my I
Phone.  2 I use a 7day pill holder to remind me where I'm at. 3 I keep one pill on my keychain and another in my brief case incase I decide to stay over somewhere.
userStories.identifier: Physically active but no six pack

userStories.tip: Take it before going to sleep to avoid possible side effects
I first started PrEP as an added safety measure, no side effects except massive improvement in my ability to relax and enjoy sex with my boyfriend.
Incredible and effective option for remaining HIV negative while sexually active with partners.
I've had no noticeable side effects.  I take it every morning.
take it at bedtime

drugs.name: Truvada

carousel_items_processed.orig: Since Truvada is only taken once a day, try taking it at the same time as your other HIV medications.
If being used for kids, the dose of Truvada will continue to change as they grow, so keep in touch with their doctor.
Keep an eye out for any new symptoms or side effects you may start to feel while taking Truvada and report them to your doctor.
Practice safe sex while taking Truvada since the medication will not stop you from passing HIV to other people.

risks_warnings.title: High lactic acid levels in the blood | Enlarged, fatty liver
risks_warnings.description: Truvada can cause high lactic acid levels in the blood, which will lead to liver damage. This is very rare, but talk to your doctor immediately if you have unexplained nausea, vomiting, abdominal pain, or weakness.

description_processed.orig: Truvada can cause high lactic acid levels in the blood, which will lead to liver damage. This is very rare, but talk to your doctor immediately if you have unexplained nausea, vomiting, abdominal pain, or weakness.

risks_warnings.title: Worsening of hepatitis B
risks_warnings.description: Before starting Truvada, your doctor will test you for hepatitis B to make sure you're not infected. People who've stopped Truvada and had chronic hepatitis B have suffered from liver damage and failure.
risk_factors: Infection with chronic hepatitis B and stopping Truvada

description_processed.orig: Before starting Truvada, your doctor will test you for hepatitis B to make sure you're not infected. People who've stopped Truvada and had chronic hepatitis B have suffered from liver damage and failure.

risks_warnings.title: Kidney damage
risks_warnings.description: People on Truvada have reported kidney damage, which can be made worse if you take high doses of anti-inflammatory drugs called NSAIDs (Motrin/Advil, Aleve, Mobic, Voltaren, etc.). Call your doctor if you develop bone pain, pain in your arms or legs, or pain or weakness in your muscles.

description_processed.orig: People on Truvada have reported kidney damage, which can be made worse if you take high doses of anti-inflammatory drugs called NSAIDs (Motrin/Advil, Aleve, Mobic, Voltaren, etc.). Call your doctor if you develop bone pain, pain in your arms or legs, or pain or weakness in your muscles.

risks_warnings.title: Fat redistribution
risks_warnings.description: People on medications to treat HIV such as Truvada have reported changes in the way fat is placed in the body, including more fat in the abdomen and breasts and less fat in the face, arms and legs. Talk to your doctor if this is a problem.

description_processed.orig: People on medications to treat HIV such as Truvada have reported changes in the way fat is placed in the body, including more fat in the abdomen and breasts and less fat in the face, arms and legs. Talk to your doctor if this is a problem.

risks_warnings.title: Immune reconstitution syndrome (changes in your immune system)
risks_warnings.description: People who first start taking Truvada can experience inflammatory responses (fever and swelling) to infections that their bodies were too weak to fight off before. Call your doctor if you get a high fever or swelling once you start taking Truvada since they can give you other medications to help fight off infections.

description_processed.orig: People who first start taking Truvada can experience inflammatory responses (fever and swelling) to infections that their bodies were too weak to fight off before. Call your doctor if you get a high fever or swelling once you start taking Truvada since they can give you other medications to help fight off infections.

risks_warnings.title: Pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP)
risks_warnings.description: Before your doctor starts you on Truvada to prevent HIV infection, he/she will make sure that you are not infected with HIV. If you take Truvada by itself and you later become infected with HIV, your body will become resistant to this and other HIV medications.

description_processed.orig: Before your doctor starts you on Truvada to prevent HIV infection, he/she will make sure that you are not infected with HIV. If you take Truvada by itself and you later become infected with HIV, your body will become resistant to this and other HIV medications.

carousel_items: Lowers bad cholesterol and triglycerides, and raises good cholesterol.
Avoid grapefruit and grapefruit juice while taking this medicine.
Tell your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain, fever or weakness.
Tell your doctor if you notice dark urine or yellowing of the eyes or skin.

clock.tip: Works faster on an empty stomach.

basics.benefits_moa: Atorvastatin is cholesterol-lowering medicine called a statin. It lowers the amount of cholesterol your body makes, which helps lower "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and raise "good" cholesterol (HDL).
basics.bottom_line: Atorvastatin is a good medication to improve your cholesterol. Statin side effects can be difficult to deal with, but the benefits might outweigh the risks.
downsides: Statins can cause digestive problems, blood sugar problems, muscle aches and stiffness, muscle injury, kidney damage, and liver damage. Some people have to stop taking this medicine because of these problems.

You're at higher risk for these side effects if you are female, are 65 years or older, drink alcohol every day, take more than one medicine for cholesterol, or have liver disease, kidney disease, or diabetes.
Eating a lot of grapefruit can raise your risk of liver damage.
Not safe to use if you're pregnant.

downsides_processed.orig: Statins can cause digestive problems, blood sugar problems, muscle aches and stiffness, muscle injury, kidney damage, and liver damage. Some people have to stop taking this medicine because of these problems.

You're at higher risk for these side effects if you are female, are 65 years or older, drink alcohol every day, take more than one medicine for cholesterol, or have liver disease, kidney disease, or diabetes.
Eating a lot of grapefruit can raise your risk of liver damage.
Not safe to use if you're pregnant.

upsides: Lowers "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and triglycerides (fats) and raises "good" cholesterol (HDL) in people who have trouble doing this through diet and exercise.
Can lower the risk of heart attack, stroke, and death, particularly if you have diabetes, high blood pressure, obesity, or a history of smoking.
One of the strongest cholesterol-lowering statin medications.
A good option for people who have high cholesterol and diabetes.

upsides_processed.orig: Lowers "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and triglycerides (fats) and raises "good" cholesterol (HDL) in people who have trouble doing this through diet and exercise.
Can lower the risk of heart attack, stroke, and death, particularly if you have diabetes, high blood pressure, obesity, or a history of smoking.
One of the strongest cholesterol-lowering statin medications.
A good option for people who have high cholesterol and diabetes.

userStories.identifier: Retired and work out 3-4 times a week
userStories.tip: Build up over months caused leg cramps; tired legs and shortness of breath when going up stairs.
Great for my libido

userStories.identifier: active doing line dancing and walking

userStories.tip: Had no idea it would alter my ability to process carbs without elevating my sugar levels. Caused major foot pain a few times, also some muscle aches from time to time.
it was good
take it at night
Lowered my cholesterol right away but caused increasing, radiating pain down the left side. Pain stopped as soon as I stopped taking the med, so not a good match for me.

userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping
Not worth it, thinking about stopping

userStories.tip: I am a long distance bicyclist and have always been active. I have Familial hyper-cholesterolemia, which  is a genetic disorder caused by a defect on chromosome 19. I have tried alternatives but Rx lowered my cholesterol 400 to 200.

userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping
userStories.tip: I felt awful all the time. Major flatulence and achy all over. Stopped taking it.
Annoying muscle pain about 3X over ten years, each time in a different muscle zone, which can be discouraging. Hot showers, working pressure pts. = relief.

userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping

userStories.identifier: retired, peripheral artery disease and s

userStories.tip: I had a moderate Cholesterol. This medication brought it down to normal levels. I am using it as a short cut to avoid worrying about what I eat. I am not a foodie, don't eat fast foods, so I had very limited choice for diet control.

userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping
userStories.tip: Actually stopped. Taking it made me feel like I'd been hit by a Mack truck. Didn't lower my cholesterol. I feel so much better after stopping. I won't ever take it again.
Take with food
hardest part was establishing the habit to take it before going to sleep. Still rely on Mango app as reminder.

userStories.identifier: In good health, so to be retired

userStories.tip: Take as prescribed and hooray for generics!

drugs.name: Atorvastatin

labeled_indications.indication: Heart protection for people with high risk

carousel_items_processed.orig: Lowers bad cholesterol and triglycerides, and raises good cholesterol.
Avoid grapefruit and grapefruit juice while taking this medicine.
Tell your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain, fever or weakness.
Tell your doctor if you notice dark urine or yellowing of the eyes or skin.

risks_warnings.title: Muscle pain
risks_warnings.description: People on Atorvastatin have reported muscle pain which may lead to muscle and kidney damage. This has been very rare. Talk to your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain or weakness or fever and you don't know why.

description_processed.orig: People on Atorvastatin have reported muscle pain which may lead to muscle and kidney damage. This has been very rare. Talk to your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain or weakness or fever and you don't know why.

risks_warnings.title: Liver damage
risks_warnings.description: Liver damage has been reported in people who take Atorvastatin. If you notice dark urine or yellowing of the eyes or skin, talk to your prescriber. Your doctor may monitor your liver periodically.
risk_factors: Prior history of chronic liver disease

description_processed.orig: Liver damage has been reported in people who take Atorvastatin. If you notice dark urine or yellowing of the eyes or skin, talk to your prescriber. Your doctor may monitor your liver periodically.

risks_warnings.title: Birth defects
risks_warnings.description: Let your doctor know if you are planning to become or are pregnant, as Atorvastatin may cause birth defects, including death of the fetus. Your doctor may discuss alternatives to help lower your cholesterol.

description_processed.orig: Let your doctor know if you are planning to become or are pregnant, as Atorvastatin may cause birth defects, including death of the fetus. Your doctor may discuss alternatives to help lower your cholesterol.

risks_warnings.title: Urinary tract infections
risks_warnings.description: People on Atorvastatin have reported getting urinary tract infections more often. Talk to your doctor if you develop burning or pain while urinating.

description_processed.orig: People on Atorvastatin have reported getting urinary tract infections more often. Talk to your doctor if you develop burning or pain while urinating.

risks_warnings.title: Increased risk of colds and flu
risks_warnings.description: People on Atorvastatin have reported getting colds or flu more often. Talk to your doctor if this bothers you.

description_processed.orig: People on Atorvastatin have reported getting colds or flu more often. Talk to your doctor if this bothers you.

carousel_items: Take this medication exactly how your doctor tells you to.
Can make your skin more sensitive to the sun.
Drink plenty of liquids when taking the medication.
Can cause diarrhea, nausea or vomiting.
Can cause rash.

basics.benefits_moa: Bactrim is a combination antibiotic that contains sulfamethoxazole and trimethoprim. It kills bacteria by preventing them from making proteins and other chemicals that keep them alive.
basics.bottom_line: Bactrim is good for treating many bacterial infections and is available as a generic. However, you can be more likely to sunburn. Also, it can cause birth defects, so talk to your doctor if you're pregnant.
downsides: Makes your skin more sensitive to the sun.
Has to be taken with plenty of liquids.
May cause birth defects.

downsides_processed.orig: Makes your skin more sensitive to the sun.
Has to be taken with plenty of liquids.
May cause birth defects.

upsides: Available in generic.
Available in different forms: tablet, capsule and suspension.
Used to treat many types of bacterial infections.
Less resistance seen to this antibiotic. Your doctor may run tests to see if Bactrim responds to your infection.

upsides_processed.orig: Available in generic.
Available in different forms: tablet, capsule and suspension.
Used to treat many types of bacterial infections.
Less resistance seen to this antibiotic. Your doctor may run tests to see if Bactrim responds to your infection.

userStories.tip: Take probiotics along with this as it upsets the stomach. Also, I find taking it first thing in the morning and just right before bed the best.
I broke the pill in half to take it. It made it easier  to swallow. Definitely stay out of the sun.

userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping
userStories.tip: Bactrim put me in a state of constant anxiety after the very first dose. After two days, I refused to take anymore of it.

drugs.name: Bactrim

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take this medication exactly how your doctor tells you to.
Can make your skin more sensitive to the sun.
Drink plenty of liquids when taking the medication.
Can cause diarrhea, nausea or vomiting.
Can cause rash.

risks_warnings.title: Diarrhea
risks_warnings.description: As with all antibiotics, Bactrim can cause diarrhea. If this happens while you're taking the medication, taking probiotics in the form of yogurt, supplements or drinks a few hours after you take the medication may help. If you develop an unusual diarrhea with loose or bloody stools weeks after you finish the medication, talk to your doctor as this can be a rare but serious side effect.

description_processed.orig: As with all antibiotics, Bactrim can cause diarrhea. If this happens while you're taking the medication, taking probiotics in the form of yogurt, supplements or drinks a few hours after you take the medication may help. If you develop an unusual diarrhea with loose or bloody stools weeks after you finish the medication, talk to your doctor as this can be a rare but serious side effect.

risks_warnings.title: Sunburn
risks_warnings.description: Your skin can be more likely to sunburn while you're on Bactrim. Avoid tanning or tanning beds, and put on sunblock if you have to be out in the sun.

description_processed.orig: Your skin can be more likely to sunburn while you're on Bactrim. Avoid tanning or tanning beds, and put on sunblock if you have to be out in the sun.

risks_warnings.title: Rash
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of severe skin rash that can require hospitalization or can cause death. These have been rare. Talk to your doctor immediately if you suddenly develop a severe blistering skin rash with fever.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of severe skin rash that can require hospitalization or can cause death. These have been rare. Talk to your doctor immediately if you suddenly develop a severe blistering skin rash with fever.

risks_warnings.title: Harm to fetus
risks_warnings.description: If you are pregnant, talk to your doctor about alternatives as Bactrim may damage the fetus.

description_processed.orig: If you are pregnant, talk to your doctor about alternatives as Bactrim may damage the fetus.

surveys.question: What tip would you give someone like me who was just diagnosed?
surveys.tip: Take a deep breath, there is help and don't be afraid to seek out treatment. I've been HIV + since jun 2014 and the medications are very effective on suppression of the virus. You aren't alone. Seek out help from family or friends or local councils to find support.

surveys.question: What tip would you give someone like me who was just diagnosed?
